result.heading: THEATRICAL PRODUCER LITTLE OLD LADY BEGINS TO DESCEND STAIRWAY
SHE STOPS, TURNS, BLOWS ANOTHER KISS AND ONCE MORE WAVES GOODBYE

direction.raw_text: - THEATRICAL PRODUCER LITTLE OLD LADY BEGINS TO DESCEND STAIRWAY.  SHE STOPS, TURNS, BLOWS ANOTHER KISS AND ONCE MORE WAVES GOODBYE. BIALYSTOCK GRACIOUSLY ANSWERS IN KIND.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't forget the checkee.  Can't produce playees without checkees.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can count on me-o, you dirty young man. CAMERA BACK TO BIALYSTOCK'S FACE FROZEN IN A LITTLE GOODBYE SMILE.  THE LITTLE OLD LADY'S FOOTSTEPS.  BEGIN TO FADE. BIALYSTOCK'S FACE QUICKLY RESUMES ITS NORMAL EXPRESSION -- DESPAIR AND DISGUST.  HE THEN REACHES INTO HIS VEST POCKET, PULLS OUT AN OLD-FASHIONED, POCKET WATCH AND EARNESTLY CONSULTS ITS FACE. CAMERA STAYS WITH HIM AS HE RUSHES INTO HIS OFFICE. BIALYSTOCK MOVES WITH A QUICK SHUFFLING GAIT TO HIS DESK. FROM THE TOP OF IT HE PICKS UP A FRAMED PHOTOGRAPH. CAMERA INSERT: CLOSE-UP OF PHOTOGRAPH.  IT IS FACE OF LITTLE OLD LADY WHO HAS JUST LEFT. CAMERA BACK TO BIALYSTOCK.  HE OPENS DESK DRAWER.  IT IS FILLED WITH TAGGED KEYS.  HE PICKS UP A KEY. CAMERA INSERT: TAG ON KEY READS: INVESTORS FILE. CAMERA BACK TO BIALYSTOCK.  WITH PHOTOGRAPH IN HAND, HE MOVES ACROSS HIS OFFICE TO A LARGE, DOUBLE-DOORED CABINET. HE UNLOCKS CABINET. CAMERA SHOWS CABINET INTERIOR FILLED WITH HUNDREDS OF SIMILARLY FRAMED PHOTOGRAPHS OF LITTLE OLD LADIES. CAMERA BACK TO BIALYSTOCK.  HE PLACES PHOTOGRAPH IN ITS PROPER NICHE AND BEGINS TO LOOK THROUGH THE FACES. CAMERA SLOWLY PANS ROWS OF PHOTOGRAPHS, BIALYSTOCK'S P.O.V. 2.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Voice Over) "Hold me, touch me', 'hold me, touch me', 'hold me, touch me', where is 'hold me, touch me'?  Ahhh ... here we are.  'Hold me, touch me.'" CAMERA STOPS PANNING AND REMAINS ON ONE OF THE PHOTOGRAPHS. BIALYSTOCK'S HAND MOVES INTO THE FRAME AND PICKS UP PHOTOGRAPH. CAMERA MOVES IN TO CLOSE-UP OF PHOTOGRAPH DISSOLVE THROUGH TO MATCHING CLOSE-UP OF SAME FACE WE HAVE JUST SEEN IN PHOTOGRAPH. CAMERA PULLS BACK TO REVEAL LITTLE OLD LADY IN REAR SEAT OF LIMOUSINE.  EXTERIOR.  DAY. CAMERA KEEPS MOVING BACK TO EXTERIOR OF LIMO AS IT MOVES ALONG THROUGH NEW YORK'S THEATRICAL DISTRICT. LONG SHOT.  45TH STREET.  SAME LIMOUSINE PULLS UP IN FRONT OF ONE OF THE THEATRES THAT LINE THE BLOCK. MEDIUM SHOT.  CHAUFFEUR BRISKLY HOPS OUT, AND SMARTLY OPENS REAR DOOR.  THE LITTLE OLD LADY EMERGES.  SHE LOWERS HER VEIL AND FURTIVELY DUCKS INTO THE BUILDING ENTRANCE. INT. MEDIUM SHOT.  DILAPIDATED THEATRE OFFICE BUILDING.  THE LITTLE OLD LADY ENTERS.  SHE RAISES HER VEIL, CHUCKLES GLEEFULLY, AND BEGINS TO ASCEND THE STAIRS. MEDIUM SHOT.  UPON REACHING THE LANDING, SHE SPOTS THE FIRST LITTLE OLD LADY COMING DOWN.  SHE QUICKLY DROPS HER VEIL. THE FIRST LITTLE OLD LADY DISCREETLY HIDES HER FACE WITH HER PURSE AS THEY PASS EACH OTHER ON THE LANDING. DISSOLVE TO FOURTH FLOOR LANDING.  THE LITTLE OLD LADY MAKES HER WAY TO THE TOP.  SHE HANGS ONTO THE BANISTER FOR SUPPORT AS SHE CATCHES HER BREATH.  SHE RAISES HER VEIL, REACHES INTO HER PURSE, TAKES OUT A SMALL FLACON OF PERFUME AND SPRAYS DELICATELY BEHIND BOTH EARS.  THOROUGHLY COMPOSED, SHE APPROACHES BIALYSTOCK'S DOOR.  SHE RAPS ON THE DOOR THREE TIMES IN QUICK SUCCESSION, WAITS A MOMENT, RAPS TWICE AND THEN THREE TIMES AGAIN.  SUDDENLY THE DOOR IS FLUNG OPEN. MEDIUM SHOT.  MAX BIALYSTOCK BIALYSTOCK (leering) Darling!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MEDIUM SHOT OVER BIALYSTOCK'S SHOULDER.  LITTLE OLD LADY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (passionately) Hold me, touch me. CUT TO TWO SHOT.  BIALYSTOCK CLUTCHES THE LITTLE OLD LADY IN A PASSIONATE EMBRACE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Devil woman. FREEZE ACTION. SUPER-IMPOSE FIRST CREDIT:  ZERO MOSTEL. RESUME ACTION. THE LITTLE OLD LADY GIGGLES JOYOUSLY AND THEN SLIPS FROM BIALYSTOCK'S GRASP, DARTS INTO THE OFFICE AND DUCKS BEHIND THE COUCH.  SHE POPS HER HEAD UP.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Finder's keepers. FREEZE ACTION. SUPER-IMPOSE: TITLE OF FILM RESUME ACTION.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here I come, ready or not. BIALYSTOCK LEAPS THROUGH THE AIR TOWARDS THE COUCH. FREEZE-ACTION. CREDIT. RESUME ACTION. BIALYSTOCK LANDS BADLY.  HE WRITHES IN PAIN.  LITTLE OLD LADY COQUETTISHLY CRAWLS TO HIM.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the matter?  Papa no want to play with baby?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ohhhhhh. FREEZE-ACTION.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CREDIT. RESUME ACTION. BIALYSTOCK REACHES OUT FOR HER.  SHE ELUDES HIM, DARTS INTO A CHAIR, CROSSES HER LEG SEDUCTIVELY, RAISES HER SKIRT JUST ABOVE HER KNEE REVEALING A GOLDEN ROSE AND GARTER. FREEZE-ACTION. CREDIT. RESUME ACTION. BIALYSTOCK STRUGGLES TO HIS FEET.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come to Papa.  Come to Papa do. LITTLE OLD LADY LEAPS OUT OF HER CHAIR AND POSES, COYLY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To the victor go the spoils. BIALYSTOCK STARTS FOR HER.  SHE RUSHES AROUND A CHAIR AND DUCKS BEHIND IT.  BIALYSTOCK TIPTOES ON TO CHAIR AND PEEKS OVER IT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm gonna get you. FREEZE-ACTION. CREDIT. RESUME ACTION. CUT TO LITTLE OLD LADY WEDGED BETWEEN DESK AND BACK OF CHAIR. SHE STRAIGHTENS HER LEGS AND SENDS THE CHAIR HURTLING ACROSS THE ROOM. CLOSE-UP OF BIALYSTOCK'S FACE:  TERROR. FREEZE-ACTION. CREDIT. RESUME ACTION. BIALYSTOCK CRASHES INTO RADIATOR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ohhhhhhhh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CUT TO LITTLE OLD LADY.  SHE IS LYING PHONE ON THE DESK, PREENING HERSELF AND PURRING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Meeow.  Meeow.  I wonder where Old Tom is tonight?  Meeow. BIALYSTOCK, WITH GREAT WILL, PUSHES THE HATE OUT OF HIS FACE AND REPLACES IT WITH SWEETNESS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rowrrr. BIALYSTOCK GLIDES IN TOM-CAT FASHION OVER TO HIS PREENING PUSSY-CAT. FREEZE-ACTION. CREDIT. RESUME ACTION. BIALYSTOCK FINISHES CROSSING TO DESK, PUTS HIS FACE DOWN NEAR HERS AND SOFTLY MEWS INTO HER EAR.  SHE SUDDENLY LETS OUT A FIERCE HOWL AS SHE REBUFFS HIM WITH A SAVAGE SWIPE OF HER "PAW".  BIALYSTOCK GRABS HIS STRICKEN FACE WITH BOTH HANDS AND SHRIEKS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aieeeeyiyiyiyiyi, CLOSE-UP OF BIALYSTOCK'S PAIN-RIDDEN FEATURES. STOP ACTION. CREDIT. RESUME ACTION. BIALYSTOCK FALLS INTO THE CHAIR MOANING.  SHE HOPS ON TO HIS LAP.  FROM HIS BREAST POCKET SHE TAKES A HANDKERCHIEF AND TENDERLY DABS HIS CHEEK WITH IT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, Bialy, Bialy, darling, did I hurt you? FREEZE-ACTION. CREDIT. RESUME ACTION.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My hand.  My hand.  I can't turn my hand. (he turns his hand) THERE IS A RAPPING AT THE DOOR.  WE HEAR IT, THEY DON'T.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (taking his hand) Don't worry.  I'll kiss it and make it well. (she smothers his hand with kissers)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (trying to rescue his hand) Enough.  It's better.  Please, Lambchop, it's better.  Stop. You're hurting it again. CUT TO DOOR.  IT OPENS.  LEO BLOOM ENTERS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (his forward motion arrested by the unbelievable scene) How do you do.  I mean ... Excuse me ... I mean ...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mean ooops, don't you?  Say ooops and get out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll wait in the hall ...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oooooooops!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (backing out of door) Ooooooops. LITTLE OLD LADY HOPS OFF BIALYSTOCK'S LAP AND GOES TO DOOR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't abide a peeping Tom. There's one in the apartment just opposite my bedroom window.  I swear that man NEVER takes his field glasses off me for a minute.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SHE LOCKS DOOR AND STARTS BACK TOWARD BIALYSTOCK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Feeling better? BIALYSTOCK NODS HIS HEAD IN ASSENT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good.  Let's fool around.  Now, I'll be the innocent little milk maid and you'll be the naughty stable boy. (she goes into her act) Oh, this milk is so heavy.  I'll never reach the house.  Help.  Will someone help me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (stopping her) Wait.  Wait.  We can't play today. I have too many appointments.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (crushed) We can't play today?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thursday.  Thursday.  We'll play Thursday.  We'll play the Contessa and the chauffeur.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, the best one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (trying to steer her towards the door) Until Thursday, then, Contessa Mio.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (she sits on the sofa) Oh, Bialy, please, just a little. Just a little.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (harassed) All right.  All right. HE SQUATS DOWN IN FRONT OF HER IN CHAUFFEUR FASHION, HIS HANDS ON THE WHEEL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, the Count hired you this morning, Rudolfo ... Watch the road ... Watch the road.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't take my eyes off you.  How can I drive when you drive me mad. Mad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (she squeals with delight) Rudolfo, you dirty pig!  Pull over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (upright) Good.  That's enough.  We'll do the rest on Thursday. (he reaches down and helps her off the couch) That's a good girl. (leading her to the door) It's always such fun to see you. BIALYSTOCK OPENS THE DOOR AND USHERS HER OUT ONTO THE LANDING. CUT TO HALLWAY.  FAR SHOT.  REVEALING BLOOM WAITING OUTSIDE. WE SEE HIM.  THEY DO NOT.  BLOOM, VERY EMBARRASSED, HUGS THE WALL TRYING TO MAKE HIMSELF LESS CONSPICUOUS. MEDIUM SHOT.  BIALYSTOCK AND THE OLD LADY IN FRONT OF BIALYSTOCK'S DOOR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Until Thursday, then, you bawdy wench. HE SLAPS HER ON THE RUMP.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oooh.  I love it.  Hold me, touch me. CUT TO BLOOM IN SHADOWS, AGHAST. BACK TO MEDIUM SHOT LITTLE OLD LADY AND BIALYSTOCK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thursday.  I'll see you Thursday.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And we'll finish playing the Contessa and Rudolfo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good.  Yes.  Thursday.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And after that we'll play the Abduction and cruel rape of Lucretia ... And I'll play Lucretia. CUT TO BLOOM IN SHADOWS.  IT IS ALL TOO MUCH FOR HIM.  HE LOOKS THE OTHER WAY.  SUDDENLY HIS EYES WIDEN IN SURPRISE, AS HE DISCOVERS ANOTHER MAN HIDING IN THE NEXT DOORWAY.  THE MAN PUTS A FINGER TO HIS LIPS INDICATING SILENCE.  THERE IS NO PLACE LEFT FOR BLOOM TO LOOK.  HE LOOKS TO HEAVEN. BACK TO LITTLE OLD LADY AND BIALYSTOCK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, Thursday.  Will Thursday ever come?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to himself) Like clockwork. SHE STARTS TO DESCEND.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I shall count the minutes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Goodbye, my angel ... My angel! (calling after her) Hey, touch me ... wait!  Hey, uh ... Lucretia, Lucretia! WE HEAR A MOUNTING CLATTER OF FOOTSTEPS AS THE LITTLE OLD LADY FLIES BACK UP THE STAIRS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (eagerly) Yes???
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, Angelcake, you forgot to give me the check.  Can't produce a play without money, ha, ha, ha. CUT TO BLOOM.  ONCE MORE HE STEALS A GLANCE AT THE STRANGER HIDDEN IN THE SECOND DOORWAY.  ONCE AGAIN THE MAN GESTURES FOR HIM TO BE SILENT. CUT BACK TO BIALYSTOCK AND THE OLD LADY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (opening her handbag and reaching inside) Of course, the check, I had it with me all the time. SHE TAKES OUT THE CHECK AND HANDS IT TO HIM.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know what's happening to me. I must be getting old. BIALYSTOCK TAKES CHECK AND READS IT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is it all right?  I made it out to cash.  You didn't tell me the name of the play.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, it's fine.  Fine.  Good.  Good. Bye.  Bye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Til Thursday, my Darling, I shall count the minutes. SHE STARTS TO DESCEND.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (descending) Ta.  Ta.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (waving check at her) Ta.  Ta. THE MAN, WHO HAS BEEN LURKING IN THE SECOND DOORWAY, SUDDENLY SPRINGS INTO ACTION.  HE DARTS FORWARD AND QUICKLY TAKES THE CHECK OUT OF BIALYSTOCK'S HAND.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He who signs a lease, must pay rent. HE SHOVES THE CHECK INTO HIS POCKET AND STARTS DOWN THE STAIRS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's the law.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Murderer!  Thief!  How can you take the last penny out of a man's pocket?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (turns back, shrugs) I have to ... I'm a landlord!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (shouting to heaven) Oh Lord, hear my plea.  Destroy him. He maketh a blight on the land. CUT TO LANDLORD ON THE WAY DOWN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the Lord) Don't pay attention.  He's crazy. CUT BACK TO BIALYSTOCK.  HE TURNS TO RE-ENTER HIS OFFICE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (biting his knuckle) Nnnnn.  That hurt. (he sighs) I'll have to make another call. HE STARTS IN AND STOPS.  HE NOTICES BLOOM.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Bloom, quietly) Have you been there all this time? BLOOM NODS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And did you see and hear everything? BLOOM NODS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then what do you have to say for yourself?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh ... uh ... ooooooops?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (shouts) Who are you?  What do you want? Why are you loitering in my hallway? Speak, dummy, speak!  Why don't you speak?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Scared.  Can't talk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right.  Get a hold of yourself. Take a deep breath, let it out slowly and tell me who you are.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (breathes deeply. Words tumble from his mouth as he exhales) I'm Leo Bloom, I'm an accountant, I'm from Whitehall and Marks, I was sent here to do your books and I'm terribly sorry I caught you with the old lady. (he has run out of breath)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Caught you with the old lady." Come in, Mr. Tact. CUT TO OFFICE.  THEY ENTER.  BLOOM ENTERS TIMOROUSLY.  HE DOESN'T KNOW QUITE WHERE TO GO.  HE LOOKS TO BIALYSTOCK FOR GUIDANCE.  BIALYSTOCK STUDIES BLOOM CURIOUSLY FROM HEAD TO TOE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you're an accountant, eh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (timidly) Yes sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then account for yourself!  Do you believe in God?  Do you believe in gold?  Why are you looking up old lady's dresses?  Bit of a pervert, eh? BLOOM, WHO HAS BEEN QUAKING UNDER THE ASSAULT, REACHES INTO HIS POCKET AND TAKES OUT THE TATTERED CORNER OF AN OLD BLUE BABY BLANKET.  HE TWISTS THE BLUE BLANKET NERVOUSLY IN HIS HANDS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, I ...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never mind.  Never mind.  Do the books.  They're in that desk over there.  Top drawer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BLOOM DUTIFULLY GOES TO DESK.  OPENS TOP DRAWER AND BEGINS REMOVING BOOKS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How dare you condemn me without knowing all the facts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But sir, I'm not condem ...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shut up.  I'm having a rhetorical conversation. (to himself) How humiliating.  Max Bialystock. Max Bialystock. BIALYSTOCK SUDDENLY WHEELS AND SHOUTS AT BLOOM.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know who I used to be?  Max Bialystock!  The King of Broadway! Six shows running at once.  Lunch at Delmonico's.  Two hundred dollar suits.  Look at me.  Look at me now! I'm wearing a cardboard belt! HE RIPS THE BELT OFF AND HOLDS IT IN THE AIR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I used to have thousands of investors begging, pleading, to put their money into a Max Bialystock production. HE PICKS UP THE PICTURE ON DESK ('HOLD ME, TOUCH ME') TAKES IT OVER TO OPEN CABINET FILLED WITH SIMILAR PICTURES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look at my investors now.  Voila! (gestures at pictures) Hundreds of little old ladies stopping off at Max Bialystock's office to grab a last thrill on the way to the cemetery. HE PUTS PICTURE BACK IN ITS PLACE.  LOOKS TOWARD BLOOM. CUT TO BLOOM.  HE IS OBVIOUSLY TOUCHED BY THE GREAT MAN'S DILEMMA. CUT TO BIALYSTOCK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have exactly ten seconds to change that disgusting look of pity into one of enormous respect.  One ... Two ... CUT TO BLOOM.  HE IS REALLY TRYING TO CHANGE HIS EXPRESSION. CUT TO BIALYSTOCK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do the books!  Do the books! CUT TO BLOOM.  HE IS GREATLY RELIEVED.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sighing) Yes, sir.  Thank you. HE PLUNGES INTO HIS WORK. CUT TO BIALYSTOCK.  HE GOES TO WINDOW, LOOKS OUT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to himself) Window's so filthy, can't tell if it's day or night out there. HE WIPES WINDOW WITH HIS CUFF.  LOOKS AT WINDOW.  NO GOOD. LOOKS AT HIS GRIMY CUFF.  GRIMACES.  FROM HIS DESK HE TAKES THE REMAINS OF A CARDBOARD CONTAINER OF COFFEE AND SLOSHES IT AGAINST THE WINDOW.  HE WIPES WITH HIS TIE.  HE LOOKS OVER HIS SHOULDER AT BLOOM TO SEE IF HE IS WATCHING.  BLOOM IS WATCHING.  THEIR EYES MEET.  BLOOM'S EYES RETREAT. BIALYSTOCK VICTORIOUSLY TURNS AWAY AND LOOKS OUT THE WINDOW DOWN INTO THE STREET. CAMERA:  SHOT OF STREET.  BIALYSTOCK'S POINT OF VIEW.  A WHITE ROLLS ROYCE SLOWLY MAKES ITS WAY UP THE BLOCK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (voice over as camera follows Rolls) Look at that.  A white Rolls Royce. That's it baby, when you got it, flaunt it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (off screen) Koff, koff ... ahem, ahem ... harrumph ...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I assume you are making those cartoon noises to attract my attention.  Am I correct in my assumption, you fish-faced enemy of the people? BLOOM IS WOUNDED.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have hurt your feelings. BLOOM NODS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good, what is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, may I speak to you for a minute?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (looking at his watch) Go!  You have fifty-eight seconds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, sir, it seems ...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (interrupting) You have forty-eight seconds left. Hurry.  Hurry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (speedily) In looking at your books, I've discovered that ...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (interrupting) Twenty-eight seconds, hurry, hurry, you're using up your time. IN HIS ANXIETY, BLOOM UNCONSCIOUSLY REACHES INTO HIS POCKET TAKES OUT THE OLD BLUE BLANKET AND NERVOUSLY STROKES HIS CHEEK WITH IT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Bialystock, I cannot function under these conditions. BIALYSTOCK CURIOUSLY EYES THE BLANKET.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're making me extremely nervous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is that?  A handkerchief? BLOOM QUICKLY BEGINS TO PUT AWAY HIS BLUE BLANKET.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's nothing ... nothing. QUICK AS A FLASH, BIALYSTOCK REACHES OVER AND SNATCHES IT OUT OF BLOOM'S HAND.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If it's nothing, why can't I see it? BLOOM LEAPS UP IN HOT PURSUIT OF HIS BLANKET.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (shrieking in panic) My blanket.  Give me my blue blanket. BIALYSTOCK, TAKEN ABACK, HURRIEDLY GIVES THE BLANKET BACK TO BLOOM.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here, don't panic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (clutching his blanket) I'm sorry ... I don't like people touching my blue blanket.  It's not important.  It's a minor compulsion. I can deal with it if I want to. It's just that I've had it ever since I was a baby and ... and ... I find it very comforting. HE KISSES IT AND SHOVES IT INTO HIS POCKET.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to himself) They come here.  They all come here. How do they find me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (recovering his dignity) Mr. Bialystock ...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, Prince Mishkin, what can we do for you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is hardly a time for levity. I've discovered a serious error here in the accounts of your last play. BIALYSTOCK MOVES AROUND THE DESK TO EXAMINE THE LEDGER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where?  What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: According to the backer's list you raised $60,000.  But the show you produced only cost fifty-eight thousand.  There's two thousand dollars unaccounted for.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I went to a Turkish bath, who cares? The show was a flop.  What difference does it make?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It makes a great deal of difference. That's fraud.  If they found out, you could go to prison.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why should they find out?  It's only two thousand dollars,  Bloom, do me a favor, move a few decimal points around.  You can do it. You're an accountant.  The word 'count' is part of your title.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (aghast) But that's cheating!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not cheating ... It's charity. Bloom, look at me ... look at me! I'm drowning.  Other men sail through life.  Bialystock has struck a reef.  Bloom, I'm going under.  I am being sunk by a society that demands success, when all I can offer is failure.  Bloom, I'm reaching out to you.  Don't send me to jail.  Help!  Help!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . DURING BIALYSTOCK'S LAST SPEECH, BLOOM UNCONSCIOUSLY REACHES INTO HIS POCKET, TAKES OUT THE BLUE BLANKET AND RUBS IT ACROSS HIS CHEEK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh dear, oh dear, oh dear, oh dear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (faintly) Help!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right.  I'll do it.  I'll do it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, Bloom.  I knew I could con you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, it's all right ... wha?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing.  Nothing.  Do it.  Do it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (pouring over the accounts) Now let's see, two thousand dollars. That isn't much.  I'm sure I can hide it somewhere.  After all, the department of internal revenue isn't interested in a show that flopped.

direction.raw_text: This is no good.  I'm not killing you.  Don't you understand, you have broken the Siegfried Oath. You must die.  Vill you cooperate!!! CUT TO TIGHT TWO SHOT.  BIALYSTOCK AND BLOOM SCRUNCHED BEHIND DESK.  THEY STARE AT EACH OTHER IN AMAZEMENT.  THERE IS A TIMOROUS KNOCK AT THE DOOR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (together) Come in.  Come in. ULLA ENTERS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hear noise.  You call? SHE LOOKS AROUND.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are you? SHE CONTINUES WALKING UNTIL SHE SEES THEM CROUCHED BEHIND THE DESK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ahhh.  I see you.  You like something?  Coffee? BIALYSTOCK AND BLOOM LOOK AT EACH OTHER IN DISBELIEF.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Coffee.  Yes.  That's a good idea. (with great emphasis) Why don't you ask the gentleman with the gun... The gentleman who is shooting at us... and trying to kill us... what he will have.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Liebkind) You like coffee? CUT TO BIALYSTOCK AND BLOOM.  THEY STARE AT EACH OTHER, DUMBFOUNDED.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, please.  Black.  Two sugars. ULLA REPEATS TO HERSELF AS SHE STARTS FOR THE DOOR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three coffees.  Two regular.  One black... two sugars. SHE EXITS AND CLOSES THE DOOR BEHIND HIM. BIALYSTOCK LOOKS UP TO THE FATES AND MAKES A SMALL SOUND OF DESPAIR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And now ve must resume hostilities. Are you coming out from behind that desk or not?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cowards, miserable cringing cowards. Clinging to life like baby butterflies.  Vatch, vatch and remember.  Franz Liebkind vill show you how to die like a man! HE PLACES THE MUZZLE OF THE GUN AGAINST HIS TEMPLE.  BLOOM AND BIALYSTOCK PEER OVER THE DESK TO SEE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (exhalted) Soon I vill be vit mine Fuhrer, und Goering, und Goebbels, and Himmler. I'm coming boys! HE PULLS THE TRIGGER.  CLICK.  CLICK.  CLICK.  THE GUN IS JAMMED.  HE THROWS THE GUN DOWN IN DISGUST.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in utter anguish) Boy, vhen things go wrong! HE FALLS INTO A CHAIR AND SOBS LIKE A CHILD.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm a failure.  I'm a failure.  I'm a failure. BIALYSTOCK AND BLOOM COME OUT FROM BEHIND DESK.  BIALYSTOCK LOOKS AT HIS WATCH.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Five o'clock.  Killed a whole day playing hide-and-seek with a crazy Kraut. BIALYSTOCK PICKS UP LUGER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (still sobbing) I'm not crazy.  I'm inept. HE CONTINUES TO SOB.  BLOOM WALKS OVER TO THE WEEPING LIEBKIND AND COMFORTINGLY PATS HIM ON THE SHOULDER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There, there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (looking around) Vhere?  Vhere?... oh...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Liebkind) You crazy lunatic!  What are you shooting at us for?  Why don't you use this (indicates gun) where it will do us some good?  Why don't you shoot the actors? (the thought strikes home) Liebkind, have I ever steered you wrong?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Always.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never mind.  Listen.  Every night people are laughing at your beloved Fuhrer.  Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's that LSD und his verdampter babies!...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (handing him the gun and some money) Here.  Buy bullets.  Kill.  Kill them all!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What???
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Bloom) Shut up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.  The actors.  I must destroy the actors. LIEBKIND STARTS TO GO.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop!  Stop!  This is insanity. HE LEAPS ACROSS THE ROOM AND WRENCHES THE GUN FROM LIEBKIND'S HAND.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (screaming) Have you lost your mind?  What are you talking about?  Kill the actors. You can't kill the actors -- they're not animals, they're human beings!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They are?  Have you ever eaten with one?  Liebkind, go!  Kill!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Liebkind, no!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Bloom) What are you doing?  We're trapped. It's either the show or us.  There's no way out.  What can we do, blow up the theatre? BIALYSTOCK FREEZES AS THE THOUGHT TAKES HOLD. CUT TO CLOSE-UP OF BLOOM.  HIS EYES NARROW AS HE SERIOUSLY CONSIDERS THE PROPOSAL. CUT TO CLOSE-UP LIEBKIND.  HIS FACE A POSTER OF SHINING APPROVAL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAMERA PULLS BACK.  THE THREE OF THEM SEARCH EACH OTHER'S FACES EARNESTLY.  THEY ARE OBVIOUSLY IN ACCORD. FADE OUT: FADE IN.  DARKENED CELLAR OF THEATRE.  WE SEE THE FAINT GLOW OF A SHIELDED LAMP AT THE END OF A TUNNEL.  AS THE CAMERA MOVES THROUGH TUNNEL CLOSER AND CLOSER TO THE LIGHT, WE MAKE OUT THE SHADOWY FORMS OF THREE MEN. CAMERA DOLLIES IN TO REVEAL BIALYSTOCK, BLOOM AND LIEBKIND. BLOOM IS HOLDING A MINER'S LAMP.  LIEBKIND IS TRYING BRICK LOOSE FROM WALL.  BIALYSTOCK IS CONSULTING MAP.  BRICK COMES LOOSE.  LIEBKIND REMOVES IT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (the surgeon at work) Dynamite. BLOOM SLAPS A NEATLY TAPED BUNDLE OF DYNAMITE INTO LIEBKIND'S HAND.  LIEBKIND GENTLY PLACES IT IN OPENING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuse cap. BIALYSTOCK REACHES INTO HIS POCKET AND HANDS HIM A FUSE CAP. LIEBKIND PUTS CAP IN PLACE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuse. BLOOM REACHES IN POCKET, TAKES OUT SPOOL OF FUSE, HANDS IT TO LIEBKIND.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. LIEBKIND TIES FUSE IN PLACE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gut.  Now for the master connection. CAMERA FOLLOWS THEM AS THEY MOVE BACK THROUGH THE TUNNEL. LIEBKIND TRAILS FUSE FROM SPOOL.  THEY FINALLY EMERGE INTO AN OPEN AREA OF CELLAR DIRECTLY BENEATH THE STAGE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gut.  Now vhere's the other fuse? BLOOM RAISES HIS LAMP, REVEALING A SIMILAR TUNNEL ON THE OTHER SIDE OF THE CELLAR.

direction.raw_text: There it is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAMERA INSERT: CLOSE-UP SIMILAR FUSE PROTRUDING FROM SECOND TUNNEL. BACK TO SCENE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Bloom) Pick it up and bring it here, please.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. HE STARTS TOWARD SECOND TUNNEL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (anxiously) Where are you going vit the light?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need it.  How'm I gonna find the fuse?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, ve come vit you.  All for one and all in the light. THE THREE OF THEM GINGERLY TIPTOE OVER TO SECOND TUNNEL ENTRANCE.  BLOOM PICKS UP THE FUSE.  THEY TIPTOE BACK. BLOOM HANDS FUSE TO LIEBKIND. LIEBKIND REACHES INTO HIS KNAPSACK, TAKES OUT LITTLE BLACK METAL BOX WITH TWO TERMINAL CAPS AT EITHER END AND SETS IT DOWN ON CELLAR FLOOR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now ve take the two fuse leads, attach them to the terminals of the conductor and ve're in business.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (grinning) You mean out of business.  Heh, heh. LIEBKIND BEGINS FIDDLING WITH THE FUSE LEADS AND TERMINALS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Max, I...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (irritated.  He has not time for small talk) What is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I... Well, it's just that... I'm sorry I called you fat, fat, fat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (smacking Bloom affectionately on the shoulder) Ahhhhhh.  Leo, Leo, Leo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (mumbling to himself) Plus to minus.  Negative to positive. Male to...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on.  Let's get going.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Qviet.  Qviet  This is very important. HE TURNS BACK TO HIS WORK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vait a minute.  Vait a minute. Male to male?  Male to female? Female to male?  Female to female? Vait a minute.  In people, male to female.  But electricity is strange. It's male to male. HE QUICKLY FINISHES THE CONNECTION.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sehr gut. (to Bialystock) Slow fuse, please. BIALYSTOCK REACHES INTO HIS POCKET AND HANDS LIEBKIND A ROLL OF FUSE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. HE BEGINS TYING SLOW FUSE TO CONDUCTOR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (as he works) Now ve take the slow fuse.  Tie one end to the master connection and the other ve attach to the detonator. HE FINISHES CONNECTIONS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come, ve go to the detonator. THEY BEGIN TO MOVE BACK AS LIEBKIND SLOWLY SPOOLS OUT FUSE. THEY START UP THE STAIRS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vait a minute.  Are you sure this is slow fuse?  It feels like qvick fuse. (to Bloom) Shine your light on it. BLOOM SHINES LIGHT ON FUSE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know.  I don't know.  The markings are so similar.  Qvick fuse or slow fuse? LIEBKIND TAKES A WOODEN MATCH OUT OF HIS POCKET.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I must find out.  It is critical. HE STRIKES THE MATCH AND LIGHTS THE FUSE.  WHOOSH!  IT IGNITES.  THE SPARKS RUSH TOWARD THE MASTER CONNECTION. LIEBKIND CHARGES DOWN THE STAIRS AND CHASES AFTER THE QUICK BURNING FUSE FOR ALL HE'S WORTH.  HE CATCHES UP WITH IT JUST BEFORE IT REACHES THE MASTER CONNECTION AND QUICKLY STAMPS IT OUT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's face it.  That was dumb. HE TROTS BACK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boys, vhere is you? BIALYSTOCK AND BLOOM COME CRAWLING OUT FROM BEHIND STAIRS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (seeing them) Dot vas the qvick one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We assumed that. LIEBKIND REACHES INTO HIS POCKET AND SHOWS THEM A ROLL OF FUSE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here.  You see.  This is the slow fuse.  It is much wider.  It has more resistance, more density. Therefore, it burns slower.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mean you had the slow fuse in your pocket all the time and you forgot to put it on?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.  Amazing isn't it? BIALYSTOCK RAISES HIS CANE AND SMASHES LIEBKIND ON THE HELMET.  BONNNG.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You stupid kraut!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vhy do you always call me kraut? Kraut is cabbage!  Do ve call you hot dogs?  Ve call you Yanks not franks!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right.  Finish the job.  Let's get outta here. CUT TO SIDE DOOR OF THEATRE.  THE DOOR OPENS SLOWLY. BIALYSTOCK, BLOOM AND LIEBKIND TIPTOE OUT.  BLOOM SETS DETONATOR DOWN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Und now for the final connection. HE WRAPS THE FUSE LEAD AROUND THE METAL CONTACT POLE AND RAISES THE PLUNGER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait.  I'll check to see if the coast is clear. HE RUNS TO THE END OF THE ALLEY.  LOOKS BOTH WAYS AND RUNS BACK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The coast is clear!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good.  Get down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BIALYSTOCK AND BLOOM CROUCH DOWN AND HOLD THEIR EARDRUMS. LIEBKIND GRABS THE HANDLE OF THE DETONATOR.  HIS EYES SUDDENLY GLISTEN WITH TEARS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Goodbye, my foolish fancy.  Goodbye, my misbegotten child.  Goodbye, my tortured testament of twisted truths.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do it!  Do it! LIEBKIND TENSES HIMSELF FOR THE PLUNGE.  HE STARTS AND STOPS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't.  I can't do it.  It's a demon.  It's a gargoyle, it's a monster... but it's still my child. HE SOBS INCONSOLABLY.  BIALYSTOCK ROUGHLY PUSHES HIM ASIDE AND GRABS THE HANDLE OF THE DETONATOR AND PLUNGES IT DOWN. HE HURLS HIMSELF TO THE GROUND AND COVERS HIS HEAD IN ANTICIPATION OF THE EXPLOSION.  NOTHING HAPPENS.  AFTER A WHILE THEY ALL RAISE THEIR HEADS CURIOUSLY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (quizzically) Nothing. LIEBKIND GOES TO PLUNGER, RAISES HANDLE AND EXAMINES DETONATOR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here is gut... of course, of course. In electricity, it's always male to female.  But with people, it's not always so.  Come ve must go back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you need us?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course I need you.  It's dark in there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, okay.  Let's not waste time. THEY OPEN THE SIDE DOOR AND DISAPPEAR INTO THE THEATRE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (off camera, singing) "Honeymoon, keep a shinin' in June,"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CUT TO ENTRANCE OF ALLEY.  DRUNK COMES STAGGERING INTO VIEW. HE SPOTS DETONATOR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "your silvery beams, Will light love's dreams,"  What the heck is that?  A bicycle pump? Naaah.  Lemme see.  Could it be? Good grief, it's Eli Whitney's cotton gin... Naaah.  Aahh, I know what it is. HE WALKS OVER TO DETONATOR AND SITS ON FIRE STANCHION JUST BEHIND IT.  HE RAISES HIS FOOT AND STARTS IT DOWN TOWARD THE PLUNGER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shine 'em up! HE PUSHES PLUNGER DOWN WITH HIS FOOT. CUT TO LONG SHOT OF THEATRE.  (MOCK UP) THERE IS A TERRIFIC EXPLOSION.  PIECES OF THE THEATRE GO FLYING THROUGH THE AIR. CUT TO TIGHT SHOT OF DRUNK.  HE IS ON HIS KNEES.  DEBRIS CRASHES ALL AROUND HIM.  SMOKE AND NOISE FILL THE AIR.  HE STAGGERS TO HIS FEET.  HE ROCKS BACK AND FORTH AS THOUGH HE WERE IN AN EARTHQUAKE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (bravely singing) "Sa-an Fra-ancisco, open your golden gates, Don't let a stranger wait... DISSOLVE TO TIGHT SHOT OF JUDGE'S GAVEL SOLEMNLY RAPPING FOR ORDER. PULL BACK TO REVEAL CROWDED COURTROOM. CAMERA MOVES IN TO FOREGROUND OF COURT.  THERE, SEATED AT THE DEFENDANT'S TABLE ARE, IN ORDER, BLOOM WITH HIS ARM IN A SLING, BIALYSTOCK WITH HIS LEG IN A CAST, AND A MUMMY SWATHED IN BANDAGES.  WE KNOW THE MUMMY IS LIEBKIND BECAUSE IT IS WEARING A GERMAN HELMET.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (mumbling through his bandages) Male to male?  Male to female? CUT TO TIGHT SHOT OF JUDGE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Has the jury reached a verdict?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CUT TO JURY.  THEIR EXPRESSIONS INDICATE THAT THEY ARE NOT AT ALL WELL-DISPOSED TOWARD THE DEFENDANTS. CAMERA CLOSES IN ON FOREMAN.  HE RISES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have, your honor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (off camera) How does the jury find?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We find the defendants incredibly guilty. CUT TO JUDGE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will the defendants please rise and approach the bench. CUT TO BIALYSTOCK, BLOOM AND LIEBKIND.  THEY STRUGGLE TO THEIR FEET AND HOBBLE TO THE JUDGE'S BENCH.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do the defendants have anything to say in their behalf before the court pronounces sentence?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I would like to say a word, sir, not on my behalf, but in behalf of my partner, Max Bialystock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Proceed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, your honor.  Max Bialystock is a very selfish man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whispers to Bloom) Don't help me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's a liar and a cheat and a scoundrel.  He's taken money from little old ladies.  He's talked people into doing things they never would have dreamed of.  Especially me.  But who has he really hurt? (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who are the victims?  Not me, I had the most exciting adventure of my life.  And what about the little old ladies?  What would their lives have been without Max Bialystock? He made them feel wanted and young and attractive again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (off camera, ad-lib) "Oh, Max, Max, I love you Max." "Let him go, let him go." "Don't take my Bialy."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (rapping gavel) Order.  Order.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And may I humbly add, your honor, that we have learned our lesson and we'll never do it again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will take that into consideration. The defendants shall serve not more than five and not less than two years in the State Penitentiary. (he pounds gavel) DISSOLVE THROUGH TO SIGN ON STONE WALL.  SIGN READS: STATE PENITENTIARY. DISSOLVE THROUGH TO PRISON YARD.  DETACHMENTS OF PRISONERS, LED BY GUARDS, MARCH PAST CAMERA. DISSOLVE THROUGH TO EXTERIOR OF PRISON BUILDING MARKED: PRISON LAUNDRY.  MUCH NOISE AND STEAM. CAMERA PANS TO ANOTHER BUILDING MARKED: MACHINE SHOP.  LOUD METALLIC CACOPHONY EMANATES FROM INSIDE. CAMERA CONTINUES ITS JOURNEY.  IT COMES TO REST ON PRISON AUDITORIUM.  TINKLE OF PIANO IS HEARD FROM INSIDE. CAMERA MOVES THROUGH CLOSED DOORS TO INTERIOR.  WE SEE A LONG LINE OF PRISONERS (20).  FOR SOME REASON THEY ARE ALL HOLDING MONEY IN THEIR HANDS.  LINE ENDS AT A DESK.  SEATED AT THE DESK, IN A GREY, PRISON UNIFORM, IS NUMBER: 979345, FORMERLY KNOWN TO US AS LEO BLOOM.
